syntaxes.name: Bar of Values
syntaxes.syntax: bar x(carrier) y(flight) sort(#count) tooltip(#all) count(flight)
syntaxes.description: A bar chart showing summed values by a field. Numeric data is binned to form a histogram

syntaxes.name: Treemap
syntaxes.syntax: treemap x(carrier) color(carrier) size(#count) label(flight) tooltip(#all)

syntaxes.name: Heat Map
syntaxes.syntax: x(carrier) y(flight) color(#count) sort(#count) tooltip(#all) bin(flight)
syntaxes.description: A table of two fields, showing counts

syntaxes.name: Scatterplot
syntaxes.description: Two fields plotted against each other

syntaxes.name: Pie Of Values
syntaxes.syntax: bar y(flight) stack polar color(carrier) sort(flight) label(carrier, ' (', #count, ')') tooltip(#all) percent(flight) legends(none)
syntaxes.description: A pie chart showing summed values by a field. Numeric data is binned to form a histogram

syntaxes.name: Line Chart
syntaxes.description: Two fields plotted against each other

syntaxes.name: Packed Bubble
syntaxes.syntax: bubble color(carrier) size(flight) sort(flight) label(carrier) tooltip(#all)

syntaxes.name: Stacked Counts
syntaxes.syntax: bar x(carrier) y(#count) stack color(flight) tooltip(#all) bin(flight)
syntaxes.description: A bar chart of counts, stacked by a second field

syntaxes.name: Clustered Counts
syntaxes.syntax: bar x(carrier, flight) y(#count) color(flight) tooltip(#all) bin(flight)
syntaxes.description: A bar chart of counts, clustered by a second field

syntaxes.name: Map of Values
syntaxes.syntax: map color(flight) key(carrier) label(carrier) tooltip(carrier) count(flight)
syntaxes.description: A map colored by sums of a numeric field

syntaxes.name: Map of Categories
syntaxes.syntax: map color(flight) key(carrier) label(carrier) tooltip(carrier) bin(flight) mode(flight)
syntaxes.description: A map colored by mode of a categorical field
